question: Audfly Technology CES 2024 product highlight and specification

response.query: Audfly Technology CES 2024 product highlight and specification

results.title: Focusound attracts much attention at CES 2024!
results.content: CES 2024 (International Consumer Electronics Show) has opened in Las Vegas, USA on January 9. As a leading acoustic solution provider, Audfly Technology Company made a stunning appearance with its own brand Focusound series products, demonstrating its application in smart terminals, and technological innovations in innovative acoustics.
results.raw_content:
Focusound attracts much attention at CES 2024!
CES 2024 (International Consumer Electronics Show) has opened in Las Vegas, USA on January 9. As a leading acoustic solution provider, Audfly Technology Company made a stunning appearance with its own brand Focusound series products, demonstrating its application in smart terminals, and technological innovations in innovative acoustics.
CES is the world's largest and most influential consumer electronics technology exhibition, symbolizing the intersection of the latest trends in the industry and high technology. This year, Audfly's "sound screen resonance" technology has attracted the attention of many professionals. Focusound uses screen directional sound technology to bring a very shocking personalized listening experience to on-site users in home entertainment, business office and audio-visual experience scenarios. , the effect is remarkable and highly appreciated. In addition, Focusound products have successively won the iF Design Award, Red Dot Design Award and IDEA Industrial Design Award.
At present, Audfly has reached strategic cooperation consensus with a number of consumer electronics brands and domestic and foreign automobile brands. In recent years, Audfly has continued to invest in research and development to promote innovation in acoustic technology. With the completion of the Audfly innovation test base, Focusound technology moves towards mass production, accelerating the pace of integration of display and sound, and assisting the sustainable development of the industry.

Outdoor Activities Using Outdoor Directional Speakers
In outdoor activities, such as music festivals, sports games, open-air film festivals, public entertainment activities, etc., there are often multiple activity areas and participants. Through Audfly outdoor directional speakers, information or notifications can be accurately delivered to people in specific areas. Avoid wasting sound and disturbing people in other areas.
